content.question: Which of the following best describes the context in which the poem was written?

choices.label: The poem was written to protest the passage of the Emancipation Proclamation.
The poem was written in the period after African American men had gained the right to vote.
The poem was written to urge African Americans to resist the draft at the start of the First World War.
The poem was written to protest the enactment of Black Codes in some states.

content.answer: The poem was written in the period after African American men had gained the right to vote.

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
